turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to get three small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need I want one of them to be chicken barbecue. And then let me get a special all-sausage pizza, and then one just cheese pizza but extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 3 small pizzas, 1 chicken bbq, 1 all sausage, and 1 extra cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $36, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, will you be dining in, picking up, or having your pizzas delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need it delivered, and also could you make sure that they're thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, just to let you know tip is not included in your price.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's about it today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
